data_encryption: Oura uses technical and organizational safeguards to keep your data safe and secure. When appropriate, these safeguards include measures such as anonymization or pseudonymization of personal data, strict access control, and the use of encryption to protect the data we process.
data_authority: Right to access data, Right to erasure, Right to rectification of inaccurate data, Right to data portability, Right to object to processing, Right to restrict processing, Right to withdraw consent, complain relevant EU Data Protection Authority,  opt out of direct marketing communications
data_authority_contact: e-mail, access to data via Oura on the Web, erasure of basic information directly within Services
